subject: SatCon Technology to Report Quarterly Results for the Quarter Ended March 31, 2007
body:
SatCon Technology to Report Quarterly Results for the Quarter Ended March 31, 2007

BOSTON, May 10, 2007 (BUSINESS WIRE) --  SatCon Technology Corporation(R) (Nasdaq CM: SATC), a developer and supplier of power management and system architecture solutions for the alternative energy and distributed power markets, today announced that on Monday, May 14, 2007 at 10:00 AM Eastern Time, the Company will conduct a conference call to discuss its financial results for the quarter, ended on March 31, 2007. The Company will publish an earnings press release prior to the conference call. David Eisenhaure, Chief Executive Officer will host the call to review the company's results and operations. Interested parties should call 866-290-0916 (US and Canada) or 913-312-1226 (International) five minutes in advance to participate. The call will also be open to all interested investors through a live audio Web broadcast accessible at the SatCon corporate website, www.satcon.com. For those unable to listen to the live broadcast, the call will be archived on the above-mentioned site. About SatCon Technology Corporation SatCon Technology Corporation is a developer and manufacturer of electronics and motors for the Alternative Energy, Hybrid-Electric Vehicle, Grid Support, High Reliability Electronics and Advanced Power Technology markets. For further information, please visit the SatCon website at www.satcon.com.
